attributes.action: the banning of the British use of white phosphorus, depleted uranium and/or cluster bombs both in Iraq or any future conflicts that may arise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The U.K. should abandon the use and/or selling of 3 types of  weapon which are considered inhumane in many countries-


White phosphorus target flairs- They cause horrific and slow healing burns when they go astray.

Depleted uranium anti-tank shells- They are made of a toxic carcinogen which is difficult to remove from the battlefield.

Cluster-bombs- Many of the bomblets don’t explode on impact and can lay around undetected until some one treads on them years after the war has ended.


The so called ‘debris of war’ can haunt  battlefields with the horrors of a long forgotten war and kill after peace is declared!
